articles.title: Earth sized planet discovered fifty five light years from Earth - AzerNews.Az
articles.description: Scientists have discovered an Earth-sized planet 55 light-years away. The planet, which astronomers call "SPECULOOS-3b", orbits its star in 17 hours. Despite the fast rotation period, the days and nights on the exoplanet never end, Azernews reports.
